sense.gloss: fast, quick, rapid, swift, speedy, brisk, prompt
as soon as ..., the moment ..., the instant ...
at once, immediately, without delay, promptly
as soon as..., just after..., immediately after...
hurriedly, in haste, quickly, promptly, early
immediate, prompt, quick, rapid, urgent, pressing
to bring forward (e.g. by 3 hours), to advance, to hasten (e.g. one's death), to expedite, to precipitate
to quicken (e.g. one's step), to speed up, to accelerate
sooner or later, in time, eventually
to be brought forward (e.g. by three hours), to be moved up, to be advanced
to be hasty, to be rash
to quicken, to speed up, to gather speed
early, a little earlier than usual
a little faster than usual, slightly quicker
early morning, early hour, early in the day
early on, earlier on, from early
gale, strong wind, swift wind, fresh breeze (Beaufort scale)
quick pace, quick steps, quick march
fast forward (e.g. VCR, tape deck, etc.)
immediately, as soon as possible, as quickly as possible

sdata.j: ↑早↑↓はや↓く！
sdata.e: Hurry up.

sdata.j: 「もし↑疲↑↓つか↓れているなら↑寝↑↓ね↓たらどう？」「↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑今↑↓いま↓↑寝↑↓ね↓たらあまりに↑早↑↓はや↓く↑目覚↑↓めざ↓めてしまうから」
sdata.e: If you're tired, why don't you go to sleep? "Because if I go to sleep now I will wake up too early."

sdata.j: なぜ、↑早↑↓はや↓くないのに、「お↑早↑↓はよ↓う」というのでしょう？
sdata.e: Why does one say "Good day" when the day is not good?

sdata.j: ↑早↑↓はや↓まって↑喜↑↓よろこ↓ぶな、↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑笑↑↓わら↓える↑者↑↓もの↓が↑勝↑↓か↓ち。
sdata.e: He laughs best who laughs last.

sdata.j: ↑早↑↓はや↓ければ↑早↑↓はや↓いほどいい。
sdata.e: The sooner, the better.

sdata.j: ↑早↑↓はや↓ければ↑早↑↓はや↓い↑程↑↓ほど↓よい。
sdata.e: The sooner, the better.

sdata.j: ↑早起↑↓はやお↓きの↑鳥↑↓とり↓は↑虫↑↓むし↓を↑捕↑↓とら↓える。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

sdata.j: ↑早起↑↓はやお↓きは↑三↑↓さん↓↑文↑↓もん↓の↑徳↑↓とく↓。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑遅↑↓おそ↓かれ↑早↑↓はや↓かれ↑怠↑↓なま↓けていたことを↑後悔↑↓こうかい↓するよ。
sdata.e: Sooner or later, you will regret your idleness.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑遅↑↓おそ↓かれ↑早↑↓はや↓かれ、そのやり↑方↑↓かた↓を↑知↑↓し↓るだろう。
sdata.e: You'll learn how to do it sooner or later.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑急↑↓いそ↓がなくてもよかったのに。↑早↑↓はや↓く↑着↑↓つ↓きすぎですよ。
sdata.e: You needn't have hurried; you've arrived too early.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑何↑↓なん↓でこんなに↑早↑↓はや↓くここへきたの。
sdata.e: What did you come here so early for?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はなんでこんなに↑早↑↓はや↓くここに↑来↑↓き↓たの。
sdata.e: What did you come here so early for?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑出発↑↓しゅっぱつ↓すれば↑良↑↓よ↓かったのに。
sdata.e: It is regrettable that you did not start earlier.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑帰↑↓かえ↓るべきだった。
sdata.e: You should have come home before.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑食↑↓た↓べるべきだ。さもないと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑良↑↓よ↓くなれないぞ。
sdata.e: You should eat more, or you won't get well soon.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑食↑↓た↓べないと。じゃないと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑良↑↓よ↓くなれないよ。
sdata.e: You should eat more, or you won't get well soon.

sdata.j: ↑早↑↓はや↓くこればよかったのに。
sdata.e: You should have come earlier.

sdata.j: もっと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑来↑↓く↓ればよかったのに。
sdata.e: You should have come earlier.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑早↑↓はや↓く↑来↑↓く↓るべきだった。
sdata.e: You should have come a little earlier.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑早↑↓はや↓く↑起↑↓お↓きなければなりません。
sdata.e: You must get up a little earlier.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はなぜもっと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑来↑↓こ↓られなかったのか。
sdata.e: What prevented you from coming earlier?

sdata.j: なんで↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑早↑↓はや↓くこれなかったのか。
sdata.e: What prevented you from coming earlier?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はできる↑限↑↓かぎ↓り↑早↑↓はや↓く↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓った↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: You'd better go home as soon as possible.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそんなに↑早↑↓はや↓くここに↑来↑↓く↓る↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓はなかったのに。
sdata.e: You need not have come here so early.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれをもっと↑早↑↓はや↓くやるべきだったのに。↑今↑↓いま↓となってはどうしようもない。
sdata.e: You should have done it earlier. It cannot be helped now.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑本↑↓ほん↓をそんなに↑早↑↓はや↓く↑読↑↓よ↓み↑終↑↓お↓わってしまうことはできない。
sdata.e: You will not be able to go through the book so quickly.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はお↑姉↑↓ねえ↓さんほど↑早↑↓はや↓く↑起↑↓お↓きないんだね。
sdata.e: You don't get up as early as your sister.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑講演↑↓こうえん↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑原稿↑↓げんこう↓に↑目↑↓め↓を↑通↑↓とお↓せるように、↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑早↑↓はや↓めにくるべきだ。
sdata.e: You should come early in order for him to read your manuscript before your speech.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑帰↑↓かえ↓りが↑早↑↓はや↓ければ↑早↑↓はや↓いほど、お↑父↑↓とう↓さんは↑喜↑↓よろこ↓ぶでしょう。
sdata.e: The sooner you return, the happier your father will be.
